Camera.Features:: Color spectrum sensor, LED flash, HDR, panorama

Design.Build:: Glass front (Dragon Crystal Glass), aluminum frame
Design.Others:: IP68 dust tight and water resistant (immersible up to 6m for 30 min)

Display.Type:: LTPO AMOLED, 68B colors, 2560Hz PWM, 120Hz, Dolby Vision, HDR Vivid, HDR10+, 3500 nits (peak)

Hardware.Chipset:: Qualcomm SM8850-AC Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 (3 nm)

Multimedia.Loudspeaker:: Yes, with stereo speakers (with Dolby Atmos)
Multimedia.3.5mm jack:: No Tuned by Bose Bose 2.1 stereo sound system with a woofer 24-bit/192kHz Hi-Res & Hi-Res wireless audio

Connectivity & Features.GPS:: GPS (L1+L5), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E1+E5a), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC, GLONASS
Connectivity & Features.Sensors:: Fingerprint (under display, ultrasonic), accelerometer, proximity, gyro, compass
